name: io.github.vfarcic/dot-ai
description: AI-powered development platform for Kubernetes deployments and intelligent automation

environment_variables.description: Anthropic API key for Claude AI integration (required for deployments)
environment_variables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY

environment_variables.description: OpenAI API key for embeddings (patterns, policies, capabilities)
environment_variables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environment_variables.description: Qdrant Vector DB URL for patterns, policies, and capabilities storage
environment_variables.name: QDRANT_URL

environment_variables.description: Path to kubeconfig file for Kubernetes access
environment_variables.name: KUBECONFIG

environment_variables.description: Session storage directory for workflow persistence
environment_variables.name: DOT_AI_SESSION_DIR
